snippet: Russia negotiated longer than any other major country to join the World Trade Organization because opponents felt the country had little to gain from membership.
abstract: Russian Parliament approves the country's entry into the World Trade Organization, bringing an end to the country's 18-year effort to join the global trade group.
lead_paragraph: Russia negotiated longer than any other major country to join the World Trade Organization because opponents felt the country had little to gain from membership.

headline.print_headline: Russian Parliament Ratifies Entry Into World Trade Organization
